channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says Trump tariffs won't cause inflation to increase
item.description: The Treasury secretary's comments come just two days before the tariffs are scheduled to go into effect.

item.title: Trump's tariffs showcase his extraordinary presidential power — and its limitations
item.description: President Donald Trump's 25% tariffs on imports from Canada and Mexico took effect Tuesday. But actually collecting them is proving complicated.

item.title: Trump says Mexico, Canada tariffs will start March 4, plus additional 10% on China
item.description: President Donald Trump said his proposed tariffs on Mexico and Canada will go into effect March 4, and that China will be charged an additional 10% ta...

item.title: House Speaker Johnson just said more than most realize about Social Security
Trump threatens to slap 25% tariffs on EU, says bloc was always meant to hurt the U.S.
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to impose 25% tariffs on imports from the European Union, claiming that the bloc was formed "to screw" the U.S.

item.title: EU chief proposes plan to 'urgently' increase defense spending by mobilizing around $840 billion
item.description: "Europe is ready to massively boost its defense spending," European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said Tuesday.

item.title: Nasdaq is on track for a correction. These are the levels to watch.
Here are Trump's economic promises — and where they stand today
Dow industrials skid 670 points as Wall Street tightens focus on Trump’s tariffs
Will Trump’s tariffs push U.S. economy into recession? Many economists think so.
